name: Broken
description:
Investigate, exorcise, but above all, stay alive.


BROKEN is a single-player and cooperative online investigation and exorcism game for up to 4 players, where the goal is to solve paranormal investigations.

It all starts in the office of the investigator and his sidekick, a psychic by trade. Mandated by the Vatican, their mission is to solve all the investigations related to the paranormal and thus make their activity report. Later, they decide to recruit a scientist to bring a more "rational" expertise to their investigations with the Vatican.

Stories with a dark past unfolded.... Murders have been committed. It's up to you to solve these cold cases and other recent murders that cross the path of the living during paranormal events. Play as an exorcist, a psychic, a detective or a scientist, each with their own unique talents and personality.

  • Single player mode : Complete your character's story in multiple chapters with a spine-chilling past. Choose your male or female character and start their story!

  • Cooperative Mode : Online, Broken is playable by 2-4 players.

  • Immersion : Find yourself in an immersive world where only you and the shadows remain thanks to realistic graphics and sounds! Anguish and surprises will surprise you. Let yourself be taken in by the game and get into the skin of your character for a better experience!

  • Investigations : It's time to grab your equipment and get in touch with the dead or find clues about the murders! But watch out... they say curiosity is a bad habit... .

  • Characters : Each character has a particular liability! Play as an exorcist, a detective, a scientist or a psychic, each of whom has their own distinct talents.

  • Gameplay : From holy water, to psychic power, to baseball bats, find your character with specific skills to solve your case!

  • Voice recognition : Be careful what you say... the ghosts are listening!

  • Difficulty : In the hardgame mode be careful! Be careful not to kill your teammates! An accident happens so quickly...
